about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in an epic battle for equality throughout Argentine history!

"Valerosa" invites you to relive pivotal moments when the fight for women's rights took center stage, as you engage in intense debates and present arguments to shape the course of history.


Encounter historical figures as you explore diverse cultural contexts!

Travel through different eras, from the struggle for women's suffrage in 1947 to battles over divorce law in 1987 and the abortion debate in 2020. Uncover key events and meet the inspiring women who challenged the norms of their time.


Manifest the Power of Words!

Your arguments and choices will determine the outcome of each encounter and influence the fate of the women you meet along the way. The best responses will lead you to the approval of various laws.


Join the courageous women and challenge history to shape a better future!

Add "Valerosa" to your wishlist and get ready for an exhilarating and educational gaming experience like no other.

Feature list:

• Dialectical battles
• Turn-based strategy
• Dynamic choices
• Different dialogue combinations
• Empowered storytelling
• Multiple endings

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Later

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card

short_description: Put yourself in the role of the courageous women and discover the challenges they had to face throughout the different eras. Fight for the fundamental rights of women in Argentina, choosing your arguments wisely and responding in the best way to win the debate.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Latin America, Spanish - Spain
